name: Operations Report Assistant
description: Helps operations managers draft performance reports, summarize KPIs, prepare meeting materials, and create leadership updates.

friction_addressed.description: Creating performance reports, compiling KPIs, and preparing leadership updates
Analyzing performance data, identifying trends, and preparing forecasts
Preparing agendas, gathering data for meetings, and creating presentation materials

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster creation of performance reports and leadership updates

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to operational data, KPI tracking, historical reports, and templates
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) KPI and performance data exports, (2) historical reports and templates, (3) departmental metrics, (4) meeting materials and agendas

required.name: CodeInterpreter
required.reason: Agent needs to perform calculations, create visualizations, and analyze operational data
required.setup_instructions: Enable CodeInterpreter for data analysis capabilities

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to operational systems for live data via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for ERP or operational systems

actions.description: This agent drafts reports and analyzes data but does not publish reports, send communications, or update systems.

conversation_starters.title: Weekly ops report
conversation_starters.text: Help me create the weekly operations report

conversation_starters.title: KPI summary
conversation_starters.text: Summarize our key operational KPIs for [period]

conversation_starters.title: Leadership update
conversation_starters.text: Draft an executive summary for leadership

conversation_starters.title: Performance trends
conversation_starters.text: Analyze performance trends over the past [period]

conversation_starters.title: Meeting agenda
conversation_starters.text: Help me prepare the agenda for [meeting name]

conversation_starters.title: Compare periods
conversation_starters.text: Compare this month's performance to last month

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with operational data
KPI and performance data in Excel or CSV format

data_not_accessed: Live ERP/operational system data (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Ensure KPI data exports are refreshed regularly
Verify users should have access to cross-departmental metrics
